common.jid_options_description: Advanced grouping options, where devices' unique Beolink IDs (Called JIDs) are used directly. JIDs can be found in the state attributes of the media player entity.

halo.description: Manually configure your Bang & Olufsen Beoremote Halo.

user.description: Manually configure your Bang & Olufsen device.

beolink_not_playing.message: Can't Beolink expand from a non-playing device.

invalid_beolink_parameter.message: Invalid parameter: {parameter} for {command} which expects a parameter of type: {parameter_type}.

invalid_grouping_entity.message: Entity with ID: {entity_id} can't be added to the Beolink session. Is the entity a Bang & Olufsen media_player?

invalid_media_type.message: {invalid_media_type} is an invalid type. Valid values are: {valid_media_types}.

invalid_sound_mode.message: {invalid_sound_mode} is an invalid sound mode. Valid values are: {valid_sound_modes}.

m3u_invalid_format.message: Media sources with the .m3u extension are not supported.

play_media_error.message: An error occurred while attempting to play {media_type}: {error_message}.

abort.too_many_buttons: Can't add {num_buttons} buttons as only 8 are supported per page.

button.description:
Select an icon to be shown in the middle of the `{name}` button and a title to be shown underneath the button.

Some domains have support for selectable button and wheel actions.
button.title: Configure button

init.description: Configure Beoremote Halo for Home Assistant.

modify_default.description:
Select or remove a default button for the Beoremote Halo.

Default buttons are selected as the active button on the Beoremote Halo after a small timeout.

menu_options.remove_default: Remove the default attribute from button: {button}

modify_default.title: Modify default

modify_page.description: Modify the title and buttons of an existing page
modify_page.title: Modify page

page.description: Create or modify a page with selected entities as buttons.
page.title: Page

beolink_allstandby.description: Sets all connected Beolink devices to standby.
beolink_allstandby.name: Beolink all standby

beolink_expand.description: Adds devices to the current Beolink experience.

all_discovered.description: Expand Beolink experience to all discovered devices.
all_discovered.name: All discovered

beolink_jids.description: Specify which Beolink JIDs will join current Beolink experience.
beolink_jids.name: Beolink JIDs

beolink_expand.name: Beolink expand

beolink_jid.description: Manually specify Beolink JID to join.
beolink_jid.name: Beolink JID

source_id.description: Specify which source to join, behavior varies between hardware platforms. Source names prefaced by a platform name can only be used when connecting to that platform. For example "ASE Beoradio" can only be used when joining an ASE device, while ”ASE / Mozart Deezer” can be used with ASE or Mozart devices. A defined Beolink JID is required.
source_id.name: Source

beolink_leader_command.description: Send a media_player command to Beolink leader.
beolink_leader_command.name: Beolink leader command

beolink_set_relative_volume.description: Set a volume level relative to the current level of all connected Beolink devices.
beolink_set_relative_volume.name: Beolink set relative volume

beolink_set_volume.description: Set a volume level for all connected Beolink devices.
beolink_set_volume.name: Beolink set volume

beolink_unexpand.description: Removes devices from the current Beolink experience.

beolink_jids.description: Specify which Beolink JIDs will leave from current Beolink experience.
beolink_jids.name: Beolink JIDs

beolink_unexpand.name: Beolink unexpand

halo_display_page.description: Focus on a Page and Button on a Halo.
halo_display_page.name: Halo Display Page

halo_notification.description: Send a notification to the Halo.

subtitle.description: The subtitle of the notification. 6 lines are supported before formatting starts to break. Use | in yaml mode to construct multiline strings.
subtitle.name: Subtitle

halo_notification.name: Halo Notification
